Keqing
Yuheng, Star of Change

Civilian units ignore all [ICON_Movement] Movement penalties for terrain and features. Builders and Military Engineers can immediately move after being purchased, and their [ICON_Movement] Movement is fully restored after performing their first build action.

Keqing, Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing, the future of Liyue lies in your hands. You exemplify to your people, and make your decisions as fast as nimble lightning. Under your leadership, your people shall rewrite the order that has existed for millennia, replace the old gods as the masters of your own universe, and stand the test of time. Stand at the cutting edge of the times, create new paths with your own hands, and forge your ideas into actions.
Ningguang
Tianquan, All-Seeing Star

Receive an extra level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility when sending an international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to another civilization. All spies start with the Surveillance promotion. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and +50% [ICON_Gold] Gold from international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.

Ningguang, Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, none that happens in Liyue, whether good or bad, can ever escape your eyes and ears. You are kind towards your people, but are also a perfect hunter whom none of your enemies could ever hope to match, remaining unsurpassed in all of Teyvat. Continue investing, expand your trade routes, and develop the Jade Chamber so that it can cast its shadow over the whole of Liyue in the moonlight.
